Heya! :)

Sandy, if you want to post your characters arriving on scene, fee=
l free to do so. :) 

For the old Maximal base, If I understand it correctl=
y, and I am sure I will be corrected if I am wrong, it is the Axalon's cras=
h site, which was fixed up and utilized by the Maximals during the Beast Wa=
r's cartoon. Kraftlos described it a bit in Message #69458, and of course T=
uscon left on his mission to the black fortress from there, so you should b=
e familiar with it already :) Just don't forget the huge two headed dragon =
floating above it. So far it has not attacked. 

Since this is Kraftlos' sh=
ow over there, you might want to get with him as well if you have any quest=
ions. I will help as I can :)

The Ark of course looks much like it did in =
the old 80's cartoon, except that you have Autobots and Decepticons laying =
around inside it . . . much like the description I gave for Quickstride's b=
enefit. Also there is a force field which Lord Elder or Kup can lower to le=
t Tuscon in.

I hope this is helpful?

Preston
